Join 0800 75 87 87 Enquire 0800 75 87 87 Hotels Home Home Flights Flights South Pacific Australia Asia UK & Europe North America South America Africa Holidays Holidays South Pacific Australia New Zealand Asia UK & Europe North America Sports and Events Tours Helloworld Exclusives Imagine Holidays Hotels Hotels South Pacific Australia New Zealand Asia UK & Europe North America South America Africa Middle East Cruise Cruise Stores Stores Northland Auckland & Auckland Region Waikato Coromandel Bay of Plenty incl Rotorua & Tauranga Hawkes Bay Manawatu & Whanganui New Plymouth Wairarapa Porirua and Paraparaumu Hutt Valley Wellington Nelson, Marlborough & Tasman Christchurch & Canterbury Region Southland Otago Extras Extras About Us Allianz Travel Insurance A.T.A Blog Careers Cash Passport Cover-More Travel Insurance Explore Magazine Finance & Payment Options Franchise Opportunities Gift Cards Helloworld Travel Academy Travel Brochures Weddings Subscribe Subscribe Home > Hotels > Australia > Western Australia > Ultimate Journeys - Margaret River & Swan Valley Favourites Enquire Clear Email Print Brochure Share Ultimate Journeys - Margaret River & Swan Valley Gourmet Getaway Your Western Australia Hotel INCLUSIONS: 3 nights in Perth 2 nights in Margaret River 5 full breakfasts 3 days private coach touring of Margaret River Region PLUS MORE! IMPORTANT INFORMATION: International flights to Perth are not included, please enquire for best available airfare pricing. Based on a Tuesday select departure dates only 6 Day/5 Night Margaret River & Swan Valley Gourmet Getaway We have combined some of Western Australia's most revered food and wine experiences to create a culinary journey not to be missed. Discover the art of wine making at Vasse Felix - the oldest winery in the Margaret River region, indulge in a dining experience showcasing local, seasonal produce at Cape Lodge, taste Greenlip abalone fresh from the ocean at Augusta and spend a day at Mandoon Estate in the Swan Valley. All this and more as you travel through some of the most beautiful scenery in the country. This guided small group tour is the ultimate way to experience the gourmet delights and natural beauty of the Margaret River Region and Swan Valley. Twin Share (5 Nights) Travel Dates: 17 Mar - 22 Mar 26 & 9 Jun - 14 Jun 26 Twin per person fr $5,265 Single per person fr $7,329 Note: Based on set departure dates - 28 Oct 25, 17 Mar & 09 Jun 26 Pick up Perth Airport, passengers should arrive into Perth no later than 3pm on Tuesday. Drop off Perth Airport. 20% non-refundable deposit per person required within 7 days of reservation. Final payment due 100 days prior to travel. Cancellations: More than 91 days prior to departure forfeit deposit. - Cancellations 91 days or less prior to departure - 100% of overall package cost. - No refunds for any unused portion of the tour once commenced. - All passengers are advised to take out travel insurance to cover cancellation fees. Minimum of 10 passengers is required for this tour to operate. Includes - 3 nights accommodation at Parmelia Hilton Perth in a King Guest Room - 2 nights accommodation at Cape Lodge in a Lakeview Room - 5 full breakfasts - Busselton jetty train ride - Lunch at The Goose, Busselton - Wine tasting at Aravina Estate - Nightly pre-dinner drink at Cape Lodge - 3-course set menu dinner at Cape Lodge on two evenings(excluding beverages) - Lunch at Colour Patch in Augusta - Tour of the Rare Foods abalone facility & wine tasting at Subsea Estate - 3-course lunch and tutored wine tasting at Vasse Felix - 4-course lunch with paired wines at Mandoon Estate - Macaron and wine tasting at Mandoon Estate - Bush Tucker Experience at Mandoon Estate - 3 days private coach touring of Margaret River Region with an expert guide/driver - Private car return transfers from Perth Airport - Services of a tour leader - Small group travel maximum 14 guests Per Person, from $5,265 Enquire More Deals Enquire *Terms and Conditions It is our policy to present the cost of our holidays inclusive of all airport and government charges. Please accept however that these charges are not within our control, therefore we reserve the right to pass on any increase . Travel agent professional service fees where charged, will be additional to the advertised prices . Closeout and blackout periods apply over school holidays and peak holiday periods & availability of seats & rooms is likely to be very limited over this time . Valid for sales to 31 Mar 2026. Valid for travel commenced and completed within the period 28 Oct 2025 to 14 Jun 2026 (unless otherwise specified).Price changes may occur by reason of matters outside our control which increase the cost of a Product or Service, including, but not limited to the introduction of fuel surcharges, changes to taxes or fees, or currency exchange.A minimum nonrefundable deposit equivalent to 20% of the tour cost is payable within 7 days of confirmation of your booking and cancellation prior to final payment will result in your deposit being forfeited. Final payment of your holiday cost is required at least 100 days prior to departure, there will be no refund for bookings cancelled less than 91 days prior to travel. The travel services provided by these suppliers are subject to the conditions imposed by the suppliers and their liability may be limited by their tariffs, conditions of carriage, and agreements. A minimum of 10 passengers is required for this tour to operate on a group basis with a tour leader. Information required at time of booking - full name, including title, initial and surname as per ID, any information relating to dietary/mobility/medical requirements and mobile contact number. A fee will apply for payments made by debit and credit card which may vary. Travel agents may also charge service fees. Please check all prices, availability, and other information with your travel consultant before booking. Prices shown are based on per person costs in New Zealand Dollars, for payment by cash, cheque or eftpos only. Credit card sales not permitted unless Travel Agent acts as a merchant. Capacity limitations apply and may not be available on all services. Travel requiring an overnight stay in New Zealand will be at passengers own expense. Events beyond our control such as currency fluctuations and changes to the price of aviation fuel may result in prices variations . Strict cancellation fees apply. Packages are based on consecutive nights. For full terms and conditions and cancellation fees please contact your local travel agent for more information. Trade enquiries via GO Holidays. ISSUE DATE: 22 Apr 25.
